2025-09-09.content:
General Availability release of Data Transfer Essentials.

[Data Transfer Essentials](https://cloud.google.com/data-transfer-essentials/docs/overview) offers a cost-effective option for data transfer in intra-enterprise applications, while adhering to regulatory requirements.

summary.title: Data Transfer Essentials Now Generally Available
summary.summary: We are pleased to announce the General Availability release of Data Transfer Essentials. This new offering provides a cost-effective solution for data transfer within enterprise applications, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements.
